mapper.sql: medicineId, code, type, source, pinYin, name, spec, hisMedicineCode, briefName, dosageUnit, roughType, packageDosageAmount, enable, beid
mapper.insert: insert into bas_medicine (medicineId, code, type, source, pinYin, name, spec, hisMedicineCode, briefName, dosageUnit, roughType, packageDosageAmount, enable, beid) values (#{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{briefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roughType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageDosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bas_medicine
medicineId,
code,
type,
source,
pinYin,
name,
spec,
hisMedicineCode,
briefName,
dosageUnit,
roughType,
packageDosageAmount,
enable,
beid,

mapper.update:
update bas_medicine
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hisMedicineCode = #{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
briefName = #{briefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dosageUnit = #{dosageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roughType = #{roughType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
packageDosageAmount = #{packageDosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_medicine set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hisMedicineCode = #{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, briefName = #{briefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosageUnit = #{dosageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roughType = #{roughType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packageDosageAmount = #{packageDosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bas_medicine where 1=1 and beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid} ${filter}
select * from bas_medicine where code = #{code} and beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update bas_medicine set enable='0' where beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
